title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: voidData hiding, data abstraction, parameterized type, exceptions, coercions, inheritance, multiple inheritance, functions as first class objects. Least fixed points of functions, lambda calculus functional programming, LISP, S-expressions, list functions mathematical functions, APPLY and MAPCAR, lambda expressions.
